title: Reapers of Souls and Magic - A Rohrlands Saga
description: The Gods created the Rohrlands, then created the Elfaheen to breathe life into their barren world. The Elfaheen filled the world with mystical creatures and lived in peace. Until pride, envy, and rebellion blossomed.Filled with dark desire, Lavalor led thirteen Elfaheen to create the realm of Asmordia and in their arrogance, they inadvertently created the multitudes of multiverses, including Earth. Now, the arrival of three outworlders, from the realm of Earth, setting off the Im’Shallene – the end of all things.Filled with innocence and naivety, the Elfaheen, Tetra, is forced to ally with Lavalor to save both the Rohrlands and his corrupt realm, Asmordia. To do this, Tetra must find the outworlders and either send them back or kill them. Along her journey, Tetra faces the realization that she not only battles against Lavalor’s desire of rule and independence from the Gods, but also her own undiscovered inner demons.
author: R.E. Fisher
